TML report won't stop in case of errors;

News.new: Saudi prices update as per Sep. 15th, 2013;
Two modifiers one for weight and one for price are added to the main estimate sheet input;
A command is added to automatically calculate and add a summation of a certain repeated item in the entire estimate to the end of the estimation sheet;
Custom items can be added inside the database of a specific estimation file. So they can be treated as database items inside the estimation file;
Items can be searched and replaced by other items;
Categories or groups can be imported from eZ-Build files without importing the entire file;
Tempcon package is handling bead mastic and sheeting angle;
Purlin/ Girts package is added;
Maxseam package is added for Zamil Steel India.
This update initiates the software auto-update to be ready in eZ-Estimate;
Saudi Prices are updated according to Intelest 13-07 memo dated Dec. 8th, 2013;
Introducing a new tool “C:\eZ-Estimate\eZEstimateToSales.exe” that prepares the sheet to be sent to area offices. This tool removes the customization and unnecessary sheets from the eZ-Estimate file;
Adding a crane beam package;
Updated users’ manual.

Bugs.bug: Fixing Built-up and sheeting package bug;
Fixing “Add Freight” bug; no need to run TML report.

Database items and prices have been adjusted according to Mr. Rasheed checking.

News.new: Added built up linear meter category report.

Pricing with KG/LM in eZ-Estimate 5.5.0 As a new pricing method, KG/LM figures are introduced for Built-up, Hot-Rolled, and Crane beams sections. In this release, eZ-Estimate 5.5.0 can give the KG/LM ONLY for built-up sections.
This is only calculated after adding all required TML information for built-up and after running the TML report.
KG/LM will appear in a new column number 18 or “R”. The following is a summary of a simple procedure need to be followed in order to consider different prices of items according to KG/LM.
Work in eZ-Estimate 5.5.0 as your normal practice;
It is very important to add all the required TML information for all built-up fields;
After the completion of adding estimate items, RUN TML Report;
In column 18, you will find the KG/LM figure for the added built-up;
Use the attached finance figures to adjust the price modifier according to KG/LM category.
The same process needs to be repeated for all built-up fields;
In addition, for all HR and Crane beam sections the price modifier needs to be adjusted based on your MANUAL calculation of their KG/LM.
Zamil Steel Saudi Price Book 2014.
AUTOMATIC PRICE modification based on KG/LM for Built-up, Primary Paint, Shot Blast, Hot-Rolled by KG, and Crane Beam.

Notes.Note: For Built-up items KG/LM figures are automatically calculated after running the TML report;
For other items (Primary Paint, Shot Blast, Hot-Rolled by KG, and Crane Beam), users need to manually put the KG/LM figure in column 18.

Notes.Note: For Built-up items KG/LM figures are automatically calculated after running the TML report;
For other items (Primary Paint, Shot Blast, Hot-Rolled by KG and Crane Beam), users need to manually put the KG/LM figure in column 18.

News.new: Added new Tempcon Prices published by BCOMS in Aug. 2015;.
Added STAAD input file as package (beta version) to estimate built-up tapered sections and hot-rolled sections.

Notes.Note: STAAD software shall be installed on the PC in order to run STAAD package;
STAAD package deals only with Tapered and Hot-Rolled definitions in the STAAD input file;
PRISM definition is not handled;
COLD FORMED definition is not handled;
Member offsets are neglected in length calculations;
Hot-Rolled members are added with their designated profiles as custom items, no TML will be generated for them;
Your feedback is very important in order to enhance the package and fix any unexpected bugs.

Bugs.Bug: Fixed the problem of KG/LM in other items like paint and SB.
Fixed the India database.
Primary paint= price= in= PEB= GCC= Price= Book= –= Oct.= '15.

News.new: Added Zamil Steel India Prices 2015 Set A for trial purpose ONLY;
Added SAP $2K input file as package (beta version) to estimate built-up tapered, hot-rolled sections and user-defined sections.

Bugs.Bug: Crane beam package can now differentiate between top and bottom flanges;
Importing freight information when importing a previously saved eZ-Estimate file;
Correcting weight of hot-rolled angles;
Added the price book signature in the middle footer of all printed pages.

Notes.Note: SAP $2K package deals only with single or multiple tapering sections, Hot-Rolled definitions and user defined sections in the SAP $2K input file;
Members shall be grouped in user-defined groups in order for eZ-Estimate to recognize them;
Member offsets are neglected in length calculations;
Hot-Rolled as well as user-defined sections are added with their designated profiles as custom items, no TML will be generated for them;
No surface treatment will be added for user-defined sections;
Your feedback is very important in order to enhance the package and fix any unexpected issues.
